title: "could not add some content in"   without any suggestion on why (was - different owner)
body:
did `datalad add *` and got things not committed since some files somehow were impossible to be added (just regular .txt files, not committed or staged) under a subdirectory... 
```
add(ok): /data/famface/openfmri/data/sub026/BOLD/task001_run011/sim.nii.gz (file)
add(notneeded): /data/famface/openfmri/data/demographics.csv (file) [already included in the dataset]
[WARNING] could not add some content in /data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups [u'/data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups/behav.txt', u'/data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups/contrasts.txt', u'/data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups/participant_key.txt'] [add(/data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups)]
add(impossible): /data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups (directory) [could not add some content in /data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups [u'/data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups/behav.txt', u'/data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups/contrasts.txt', u'/data/famface/openfmri/data/run-groups/participant_key.txt']]
add(notneeded): /data/famface/openfmri/data/scan_key.txt (file) [already included in the dataset]
add(ok): /data/famface/openfmri/data/sub028 (directory)
```
then I staged them using `cd run-groups; git add *` and they staged just fine... there is no .gitmodules, .gitignore ... I might still have original state somewhere about ZFS snapshots to troubleshoot later unless there is a clear idea on WTF
